xml:
Solution for injection
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 3 - Warning: This medicine may make you sleepy. If this happens, do not drive or use tools or machines

Label 10 - Warning: Read the additional information given with this medicine

Imigran Subject 6mg/0.5ml solution for injection pre-filled syringes with device <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(GlaxoSmithKline UK Ltd)</ph> 4370211000001106

Sumatriptan (as Sumatriptan succinate) 12 mg per 1 ml

  • 2 pre-filled disposable injection POM

    NHS indicative price = £42.47

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £42.47

Imigran Subject 6mg/0.5ml solution for injection syringe refill pack <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(GlaxoSmithKline UK Ltd)</ph> 520511000001102

Sumatriptan (as Sumatriptan succinate) 12 mg per 1 ml

  • 2 pre-filled disposable injection POM

    NHS indicative price = £40.41

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £40.41

Sumatriptan 6mg/0.5ml solution for injection pre-filled pen <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(A A H Pharmaceuticals Ltd)</ph> 19671411000001107

Sumatriptan (as Sumatriptan succinate) 12 mg per 1 ml

  • 2 pre-filled disposable injection POM

    NHS indicative price = £39.50

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £39.50

Sumatriptan 6mg/0.5ml solution for injection pre-filled pen <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Sun Pharmaceuticals UK Ltd)</ph> 19277411000001101

Sumatriptan (as Sumatriptan succinate) 12 mg per 1 ml

  • 2 pre-filled disposable injection POM

    NHS indicative price = £39.50

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £39.50

Sumatriptan 6mg/0.5ml solution for injection pre-filled pen <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Waymade Healthcare Plc)</ph> 22465211000001106

Sumatriptan (as Sumatriptan succinate) 12 mg per 1 ml

  • 2 pre-filled disposable injection POM

    No NHS indicative price available

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category C) price = £39.50

SUMATRIPTAN
